hero.title: Dual Native ISP Proxy
hero.subtitle: Professional residential broadband proxy services, providing real, stable, and high-speed network proxy solutions

business.title: Main Business
business.subtitle: Residential Broadband Proxy
business.description: We specialize in providing high-quality residential broadband proxy services. IP addresses originate from real broadband allocated by ISPs to home users, tightly bound to physical locations, presenting normal home user internet behavior with ultra-high authenticity, making it difficult for websites to identify as proxies.

dualIsp.title: Dual Native ISP Proxy
dualIsp.description: Combining IP addresses from two ISPs to achieve stronger stability and anonymity, providing dual authentication guarantees to avoid detection as a single-source proxy. This is the "luxury configuration" of the proxy industry, suitable for advanced anti-detection scenarios, providing the highest level of security for your business.

residential.title: Residential Proxy
residential.description: IP addresses from real home broadband, ultra-high authenticity, perfectly simulating normal user internet behavior with extremely low detection risk.

isp.title: ISP Proxy
isp.description: Static IPs directly allocated by ISPs, combining the authenticity of residential proxies with the high performance of data centers, low detection risk, high speed and stability.

dual.title: Dual Native ISP
dual.description: Dual ISP guarantee, highest level of stability and anonymity, suitable for large-scale operations and advanced anti-detection scenarios.

company.title: Company Introduction
company.description: Edge Network is a professional network proxy service provider committed to providing high-quality, high-reliability residential broadband proxy and dual native ISP proxy services to customers worldwide. We have an IP resource library covering 200+ cities globally, with each IP having dedicated bandwidth, ensuring 99% availability and response times within 10ms.
company.missionText: Through technological innovation and service optimization, we provide customers with the most authentic, stable, and fastest network proxy solutions, helping customers succeed in global internet business.
company.valuesText: Integrity, professionalism, innovation, service. We always focus on customer needs, continuously optimize products and services, and create maximum value for customers.

about.title: About Us
about.description: The Edge Network team consists of experienced network technology experts who have been deeply involved in the proxy service field for many years, deeply understanding industry development trends and customer needs. We adopt distributed home gateway deployment to ensure precise matching of IPs with physical locations, monthly IP address library updates, and support for HTTP/HTTPS/SOCKS5 full protocols.

items.title: High Authenticity
items.description: IP addresses from real home broadband, perfectly simulating normal users

items.title: Wide Coverage
items.description: 200+ city coverage capability, meeting global business needs

recruit.title: Agent Recruitment
recruit.subtitle: Join Us, Create the Future Together
recruit.description: Edge Network is recruiting quality agent partners worldwide. We provide competitive agent prices, comprehensive technical support, flexible settlement methods, and professional market promotion support.
